string-array.item: How do I schedule a pick up or drop off ?

string-array.name: faq_answers

1) Just log on to www.laundrize.com and sign up for free. You can also sign up using your Facebook or Gmail account.2)Once registered provide us with your pin-code to check if we are operational in your area. \n3) Once confirmed, provide us with your address and you are ready to Laundrize.

string-array.name: privacy_policy_questions
string-array.item: What do we use your information for ?
How do we protect your information ?
Do we disclose information to outside parties ?

string-array.name: privacy_policy_answers
string-array.item: We collect your name, mobile number, email id, address and date of birth from you during registration. We use it for collection and delivery of your laundry clothes.

1) Identification of your laundry order with your clothes. 
2) Collect and deliver clothes from and to your address. 
3) Give you better offers and deals. 
4) Improve our customer service. 
5) To improve our website. 
6) To send email and SMS on collection and delivery of clothes, shoes and bags from you. 
7) To administer any offer, contest, promotion or discount.
We collect only necessary information from you and implement a variety of security measures to keep your information safe with us.
We use cookies to keep you in logged in state and store basic orders that you have placed in past for faster performance of site/app.
We do not disclose your information to any outside parties except our select partners to get your laundry requirements completed.
By using our website you agree to accept our privacy policies
If we change our privacy policy, we will update it here. The above policies were last updated on 18 July 2015
